protocol_name: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
protocol_name_html: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
description:
This protocol is from 'Flower Ca2+ channel in CME and ADBE' of Yao CK et al.

 

Please see the manuscript for the full method details.
before_start:
You'll need: 

 

0 mM Ca2+ hemolymph-like (HL)-3 solution:

  • 70 mM NaCl
  • 5 mM KCl
  • 10 mM MgCl2
  • 10 mM NaHCO3
  • 5 mM trehalose
  • 5 mM HEPES (pH 7.2) 
  • 115 mM sucrose

 

 

 2 mM Ca2+/5 mM K+/7 mM glutamate solution:

  • 70 mM NaCl
  • 5 mM KCl
  • 10 mM MgCl2
  • 10 mM NaHCO3
  • 5 mM trehalose
  • 5 mM HEPES (pH 7.2)
  • 115 mM sucrose
  • 2 mM CaCl2 
  • 7 mM Monosodium glutamate

 

4 μM Fluo-4 AM (Invitrogen)/100 mM Ca2+/HL-3 solution to be loaded with Fluo-4 AM dye

materials.reagent_name: 2 mM Ca2 /5 mM K /7 mM glutamate solution
4 μM Fluo-4 AM (Invitrogen)/100 mM Ca2 /HL-3 solution to be loaded with Fluo-4 AM dye

manuscript_citation: Yao C, Liu Y, Lee I, Wang Y, Wu P, A Ca channel differentially regulates Clathrin-mediated and activity-dependent bulk endocytosis. PLoS Biology 15(4). doi: 10.1371/journal.pbio.2000931

collections.protocol_name: Protocols  from Yao CK et al. (2017) "Flower Ca2+ channel in CME and ADBE"
collections.protocol_name_html: Protocols  from Yao CK et al. (2017) "Flower Ca2+ channel in CME and ADBE"

authors: Chi-Kuang Yao, Yu-Tzu Liu, I-Chi Lee, You-Tung Wang, Ping-Yen Wu

components.data: Dissect the third instar larvae in 0 mM Ca2+ HL-3 at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissect the third instar larvae in 0 mM Ca2+ HL-3 at room temperature.

components.data: Incubate in 2 mM Ca2+/5 mM K+/7 mM glutamate solution for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate in 2 mM Ca2+/5 mM K+/7 mM glutamate solution for 5 min.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.protocol_name: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.annotation: Glutamate treatment desensitizes postsynaptic glutamate receptors, thus reducing muscle contraction upon stimulation.
source_data.thread_text: Glutamate treatment desensitizes postsynaptic glutamate receptors, thus reducing muscle contraction upon stimulation.
source_data.body: Glutamate treatment desensitizes postsynaptic glutamate receptors, thus reducing muscle contraction upon stimulation.

components.data: Measure GCaMP6f fluorescence to indicate the resting Ca2+ levels.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Measure GCaMP6f fluorescence to indicate the resting Ca2+ levels.

components.data: To image GCaMP6f in high K+ stimulations, stimulate larval fillets subsequently with 90 mM K+/2 mM Ca2+/7 mM glutamate solution for 10 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To image GCaMP6f in high K+ stimulations, stimulate larval fillets subsequently with 90 mM K+/2 mM Ca2+/7 mM glutamate solution for 10 minutes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Ca2+ imaging
source_data.protocol_name: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.annotation: High K+ and Ca2+ lead to bulk Ca2+ influxes into the muscles and cause dramatic contractions.
source_data.thread_text: High K+ and Ca2+ lead to bulk Ca2+ influxes into the muscles and cause dramatic contractions.
source_data.body: High K+ and Ca2+ lead to bulk Ca2+ influxes into the muscles and cause dramatic contractions.

components.data: After 10-min stimulation, rinse larval fillets with 2 mM Ca2+/5 mM K+/7 mM glutamate solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After 10-min stimulation, rinse larval fillets with 2 mM Ca2+/5 mM K+/7 mM glutamate solution.

components.data: Image again.
components.name: Description

components.data: Similarly, focus manually the boutons subjected to 1-min 90 mM K+/0.5 mM Ca2+/7 mM glutamate stimulation and image at the 30th to 60th s every one second.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Similarly, focus manually the boutons subjected to 1-min 90 mM K+/0.5 mM Ca2+/7 mM glutamate stimulation and image at the 30th to 60th s every one second.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Ca2+ imaging
source_data.protocol_name: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Ca2+ imaging (GCaMP6f) from Yao CK et al. (2017)
source_data.annotation: All images were captured from the muscles 6 and 7 of the abdominal segment 3. Each larva was only used for one recording. The images of clearly focused boutons were further used for data quantifications.
source_data.thread_text: All images were captured from the muscles 6 and 7 of the abdominal segment 3. Each larva was only used for one recording. The images of clearly focused boutons were further used for data quantifications.
source_data.body: All images were captured from the muscles 6 and 7 of the abdominal segment 3. Each larva was only used for one recording. The images of clearly focused boutons were further used for data quantifications.

components.data: Count the GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity in type Ib boutons and surrounding muscles (served as the fluorescence background).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count the GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity in type Ib boutons and surrounding muscles (served as the fluorescence background).

components.data: Calculate final GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity by subtracting background fluorescence intensity in surrounding muscles from GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity in boutons.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Calculate final GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity by subtracting background fluorescence intensity in surrounding muscles from GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity in boutons.

source_data.annotation: The GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity of at least 10 type Ib boutons from the same muscles 6 and 7 at given time period was averaged to obtain each data value.
source_data.thread_text: The GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity of at least 10 type Ib boutons from the same muscles 6 and 7 at given time period was averaged to obtain each data value.
source_data.body: The GCaMP6f fluorescence intensity of at least 10 type Ib boutons from the same muscles 6 and 7 at given time period was averaged to obtain each data value.

components.data: Aspirate larval axonal bundle and deliver with 10-40 Hz stimulations via a glass capillary electrode.

source_data.annotation: The images were captured every 2 s using MetaMorph software and ANDOR iXon3 897 camera. All images were captured from the muscles 6 and 7 of abdominal segment 3. Each larva was only used for one recording.

components.data: Manually focus the boutons and simultaneously image in the 6th and 10th min every one second.
components.name: Description
